name: Needful Things

ingredients.item: Tempus Fugit Crème de Noyaux liqueur

garnish: The Bitter Truth Jerry Thomas’ Own Decanter bitters
preparation:
Add all the ingredients to a shaker and dry-shake.
Add ice, and shake hard.
Double-strain into an Irish Coffee mug, and add soda slowly to fill.
Garnish with a dash of bitters.
